transcript.text:
￼














B2B/Private Store - Pro Plan

Managing Store
Store Settings

2 min
overview & purpose we have made it easier for the store customer to use the system with some customizable settings for their front store store settings include customer specific settings, product specific settings, template specific settings, and other store related settings note all the settings mentioned in the settings section of store are only applicable for the front end configuration the admin can manage some site settings for store customers from the store management >> stores >> select store >> action menu >> configuration >> settings option there are two setting types store specific and default in store specific settings, you get to select the specific setting from a dropdown
Did this page help you?
